hymn.title: Out in the highways and byways of life
hymn.category: Preaching of the Gospel—A Channel of Blessing

layout.singingstanza: Out in the high -- ways and by -- ways of life, Man -- y are wea -- ry and sad; Car -- ry the sun -- shine where dark -- ness is rife, Mak -- ing the sor -- row -- ing glad. Make me a bless -- ing, make me a bless -- ing, Out of my life may Je -- sus shine; Make me a bless -- ing, O Sav -- ior, I pray, Make me a bless -- ing to some -- one to -- day.

hymn.copyright: Copyright, 1952. Renewal by George S. Schuler. Assigned to the Rodeheaver Co. All Rights Reserved. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: Out in the highways and byways of life, Many are weary and sad; Carry the sunshine where darkness is rife, Making the sorrowing glad.
Make me a blessing, make me a blessing, Out of my life may Jesus shine; Make me a blessing, O Savior, I pray, Make me a blessing to someone today.
Tell the sweet story of Christ and His love, Tell of His pow'r to forgive; Others will trust Him if only you prove True, every moment you live.
Give as 'twas given to you in your need, Love as the Master loved you; Be to the helpless a helper indeed, Unto your mission be true.
